original_title: Universal Ike Junior in Cupid's Victory
overview: Louise's father at last decides she is old enough to marry. So she in turn informs Ike of the fact and bids him come at once before father changes his mind. While Louise is getting her wedding dress ready, Ike purchases himself a dress suit. He steals a horse and buggy and starts for the train. The horse refuses to hurry.
title: Universal Ike Junior in Cupid's Victory
